trans-unit.source: 3to2 will either produce working Python 2 code or warn about why it did not. Any other behavior is a bug and should be reported.
trans-unit.target: 3to2 会产生可以工作的 Python 2 代码,或者警告为什么没有产生。任何其他行为都是一个 bug,应该被报告。

trans-unit.source: Abstract
trans-unit.target: 摘要

trans-unit.source: Because of the nature of the subject matter, 3to2 is not perfect, so check all output manually. 3to2 does the bulk of the work, but there is code that simply cannot be converted into a Python 2 equivalent for one reason or another.
trans-unit.target: 由于主题的性质,3to2并不完美,所以请手动检查所有输出。3to2 做了大部分的工作,但有些代码由于某种原因根本无法转换为 Python 2 的等价物。

trans-unit.source: Download
trans-unit.target: 下载中心

trans-unit.source: If you are root, you can also install with “./setup.py build” and “./setup.py install” (“make install” does this for you).
trans-unit.target: 如果您是root用户，则还可以使用“ ./setup.py build”和“ ./setup.py install”进行安装（“ make install”为您完成此操作）。

trans-unit.source: Intention
trans-unit.target: 意图

trans-unit.source: Refactors valid 3.x syntax into valid 2.x syntax, if a syntactical conversion is possible
trans-unit.target: 将有效的3.x语法重构为有效的2.x语法,如果可以进行语法转换的话。

trans-unit.source: Relationship with lib2to3
trans-unit.target: 与lib2to3的关系

trans-unit.source: Release for 2.7 and 3.x (last version I tested was 3.4.3): https://pypi.python.org/pypi/3to2
trans-unit.target: 2.7和3.x发行版（我测试的最新版本是3.4.3）：https : //pypi.python.org/pypi/3to2

trans-unit.source: Repository
trans-unit.target: 储存库

trans-unit.source: Run “./3to2” to convert stdin (“-“), files or directories given as arguments. By default, the tool outputs a unified diff-formatted patch on standard output and a “what was changed” summary on standard error, but the “-w” option can be given to write back converted files, creating “.bak”-named backup files.
trans-unit.target: 运行“ ./3to2”以转换标准输入（“-”），作为参数指定的文件或目录。默认情况下，该工具在标准输出上输出统一的差异格式补丁，并在标准错误上输出“已更改内容”摘要，但是可以给“ -w”选项写回转换后的文件，创建名为“ .bak”的文件。备份文件。

trans-unit.source: Some of the fixers for lib3to2 are directly copy-pasted from their 2to3 equivalent, with the element of PATTERN and the corresponding transformation switched places. Most fixers written for this program with a corresponding 2to3 fixer started from a clone of the 2to3 fixer, then modifying that fixer to work in reverse. I do not claim original authorship of these fixers, but I do claim that they will work for 3to2, independent of how they work for 2to3. In addition, this program depends on lib2to3 to implement fixers, test cases, refactoring, and grammar. Some portions of lib2to3 were modified to be more generic to support lib3to2’s calls.
trans-unit.target: lib3to2的某些修复程序是从2to3等效项直接复制粘贴的，其中包含PATTERN的元素和相应的转换切换位置。为此程序编写的大多数修复程序以及相应的2to3修复程序都是从2to3修复程序的克隆版本开始的，然后修改该修复程序以使其反向工作。我没有要求这些修复程序的原始作者，但我确实声明它们将适用于3to2，而与它们适用于2to3的方式无关。另外，该程序依靠lib2to3来实现修复程序，测试用例，重构和语法。lib2to3的某些部分已被修改为更通用，以支持lib3to2的调用。

trans-unit.source: Status
trans-unit.target: 状况

trans-unit.source: There are some features of Python 3 that have no equivalent in Python 2, and though lib3to2 tries to fix as many of these as it can, some features are beyond its grasp. This is especially true of features not readily detectable by their syntax alone and extremely subtle features, so make sure that code using lib3to2 is thoroughly tested.
trans-unit.target: Python 3 的一些特性在 Python 2 中没有对应的特性,尽管 lib3to2 试图尽可能多地修正这些特性,但有些特性是它无法掌握的。尤其是那些仅凭语法无法轻易察觉的特性和极其微妙的特性,所以要确保使用 lib3to2 的代码是经过彻底测试的。

trans-unit.source: This branch of 3to2 must be run with Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 3to2的这个分支必须用Python 3来运行。

trans-unit.source: This project came about as a Google Summer of Code (TM) project in 2009.
trans-unit.target: 这个项目是作为2009年Google Summer of Code (TM)的一个项目出现的。

trans-unit.source: To install locally (used for running tests as a non-privileged user), the scripts assume you are using python3.1. Modify accordingly if you are not.
trans-unit.target: 要在本地安装(用于以非特权用户的身份运行测试),脚本假定你使用的是python3.1。如果你不是,请相应修改。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: You should use the latest version of lib2to3 from the Python sandbox rather than the version (if any) that comes with Python. As a convenience, “two2three” from the Python Package Index is a recent enough version of lib2to3 renamed to avoid conflicts. To use this package, replace all usage of “lib2to3” with “two2three” within the 3to2 source files after installing “two2three” from the PyPI. Depending on the developer’s mood, a version of 3to2 may be provided with this change already made.
trans-unit.target: 您应该使用Python沙箱中的最新版本的lib2to3，而不是Python随附的版本（如果有）。为方便起见，Python软件包索引中的“ two2three”是最新版本的lib2to3，已重命名以避免冲突。要使用此软件包，请在从PyPI安装“ two2three”后，在3to2源文件中将“ lib2to3”的所有用法替换为“ two2three”。根据开发人员的心情，可能会提供3to2版本，并且已经进行了此更改。

trans-unit.source: lib3to2 is a set of fixers that are intended to backport code written for Python version 3.x into Python version 2.x. The final target 2.x version is the latest version of the 2.7 branch, as that is the last release in the Python 2.x branch. Some attempts have been made, however, to make code compatible as much as possible with versions of Python back to 2.5, and bug reports are still welcome for Python features only present in 2.6+ that are not addressed by lib3to2.
trans-unit.target: lib3to2 是一组修复程序,用于将 Python 3.x 版本的代码回传到 Python 2.x 版本。最终的目标 2.x 版本是 2.7 分支的最新版本,因为那是 Python 2.x 分支的最后一个版本。然而,我们已经做了一些尝试,使代码尽可能地与 Python 的 2.5 版本兼容,对于只在 2.6+中出现的 Python 特性,如果 lib3to2 没有解决,仍然欢迎提交 bug 报告。

trans-unit.source: lib3to2 is intended to be a tool in the process of developing code that is backwards-compatible between Python 3 and Python 2. It is not intended to be a complete solution for directly backporting Python 3 code, though it can often be used for this purpose without issue. Sufficiently large packages should be developed with lib3to2 used throughout the process to avoid backwards- incompatible code from becoming too embedded.
trans-unit.target: lib3to2 旨在成为开发 Python 3 和 Python 2 之间向后兼容的代码的工具。它并不打算成为直接向后移植 Python 3 代码的完整解决方案,尽管它通常可以毫无问题地用于这个目的。开发足够大的包时,应该在整个过程中使用 lib3to2,以避免向后不兼容的代码变得过于嵌入。

trans-unit.source: lib3to2 resides at http://bitbucket.org/amentajo/lib3to2, where the bug tracker can be found at http://bitbucket.org/amentajo/lib3to2/issues
trans-unit.target: lib3to2位于http://bitbucket.org/amentajo/lib3to2，可以在http://bitbucket.org/amentajo/lib3to2/issues找到错误跟踪器

trans-unit.source: lib3to2’s fixers are somewhat well-tested individually, but there is no testing that is done on interactions between multiple fixers, so most of the bugs in the future will likely be found there.
trans-unit.target: lib3to2的修复程序已经过个别测试，但是没有对多个修复程序之间的交互进行任何测试，因此将来可能会在此处发现大多数错误。
